appraisal.reason: Per this newsletter, Saturday confessions are 10:00–11:00 and 17:00–17:50, not until 18:00. Weekday confessions are 12:00–12:20, and Sunday confessions are 10:00–10:30 and 12:00–12:30. Please refer to the schedule as published here.

Please note that weekday confessions are from 12.15pm to 12.40pm, not 12.00pm to 12.40pm. On Saturdays, confessions are from 5.30pm to 5.55pm, not until 6.00pm. There are no scheduled confessions on Sundays.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock
